events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer has reported receiving an incorrect item and is requesting a refund.
Assigning this refund request to the refunds support specialist team for further handling.
Hello! Sorry to hear about the incorrect item. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received along with your order number to verify the issue?
Here is the photo of the wrong item I got, and my order number is 123456. Please process my refund quickly.
Thank you for the details. We have approved your refund and you should see the amount credited to your account within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick update and approval! I appreciate the prompt assistance with my refund.
Your refund request has been successfully processed and the case is now resolved on our end.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since we have not heard otherwise, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support.
